Reviews.Content: Best bed I slept in! Accomadations were top notch, almost felt like a hotel. The room had a/c. Great location in heart of city. Staff was friendly but were mostly hispanic and did not speak english and only occasional broken italian. CONS: one toilet and one shower for floor of up to 20 guests and NO kitchen facility.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Wunderbar eingerichtetes Zimmer mit luxuri枚sem badezimmer ;-)       Bodenbelag
